original_text: And the foremen of the people of Israel, whom Pharaoh's taskmasters had set over them, were beaten and were asked, “Why have you not done all your task of making bricks today and yesterday, as in the past?”
korean_text: 바로의 감독들이 자기들이 세운 바 이스라엘 자손의 기록원들을 때리며 이르되 너희가 어찌하여 어제와 오늘에 만드는 벽돌의 수효를 전과 같이 채우지 아니하였느냐 하니라

sentences.original_text: And the foremen of the people of Israel
whom Pharaoh's taskmasters had set over them
sentences.korean_translation: 바로의 감독관들이 그들을 다스리게 한 자들이

sentences.original_text: Why have you not done all your task
sentences.korean_translation: 어찌하여 너희의 모든 과업을 완수하지 않았느냐

sentences.original_text: of making bricks today and yesterday
